Locale.Value:
Base
- Create new documents in a base to provide more context or instructions.
- Share an individual record to a chat, where you can view and edit without going to the base.
- The layout of the record details page has been updated for a better user experience.
- Add images to options to make your survey more engaging.
- Add an "Other" option with a text box for respondents to elaborate on their choices.
- Limit the number of options in multiple choice questions.
Email
- Create multiple levels of subfolders for better email organization.
- Attachments can be displayed above the email body to ensure you never miss important information.
- Automatically Cc/Bcc yourself when composing emails for backup.

多维表格
- 支持在多维表格内新建文档，辅助说明多维表格内容
- 单条记录可独立分享至飞书会话，并可在会话内直接阅读和编辑记录内容
- 记录详情页样式优化更新，阅读编辑更愉悦
- 支持为选择题的选项添加图片，选项表述更形象
- 选择题中可添加“其他”选项并提供输入框，方便填写者输入任意内容
- 多选题支持限制可选选项数量，满足投票等场景需求
邮箱
- 支持创建更多层级文件夹，分类整理更清晰
- 附件可置顶显示，无需担心因邮件过长错过附件信息
- 支持设置写信时自动抄送/密送自己，方便邮件备份和管理
